comments.author: Jeff Dever
comments.body:
This has been converted to xml and is generated on the website.
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/httpclient/testwebapp.html

description:
The excellent webapp howto written by Olegolas needs to be integrated better
into httpclient documentation.  Currently it is in the docs directory as a html
file, but it would be better if it was in the xdocs directory as an xml file.
summary: Better integration of the TestWebApp-HowTo into the documentation
